column4: Hey there! I connected my Laptop to the TV (VGA cable), which worked great, but now everything in my panel (top) is mixed up. I was able to repair a bit of it, but stuff like the battery, the wifi-indicator and the sound-indicator can't be moved. How to I fix this? I want the clock and switch off menu on the right side, like it's used to be...
if you right click on the ones that can't move there should be an option to Unlock from Panel -- then you'll be able to move them
if you want to reset to defaults see the ubottu message
operation not permitted, even when using sudo
